text: Ivarsson is a patronymic surname meaning "son of Ivar". Notable people with the surname include: *Jan Ivarsson (born 1931), Swedish translator *Johan Ivarsson, Swedish orienteer *Johan Ivarsson (ice hockey) (born 1995), Swedish ice hockey player *Karl Marenius Ivarsson (1867–1922), Norwegian educator and politician *Lars Ivarsson (born 1963), Swedish ice hockey player *Maja Ivarsson (born 1979), Swedish singer ==See also== *16135 Ivarsson, a main-belt asteroid Category:Patronymic surnames
title: Ivarsson
